content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

There are currently no structures on the map. The agent has not successfully placed any entities or created any structures in the game world.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing Wooden Chests
- Ensure that the position is buildable before attempting to place a Wooden Chest. The agent attempted to place Wooden Chests at several non-buildable positions: (0.0, 0.0), (5.0, 5.0), (10.0, 10.0), (15.0, 15.0), (20.0, 20.0), (25.0, 25.0), (30.0, 30.0), (40.5, -82.5), (50.0, -90.0), and (100.0, -150.0).

### Errors when placing Transport Belts
- Verify that the target position is suitable for placing a Transport Belt before attempting placement. The agent tried to place Transport Belts at non-buildable positions: (0.0, 0.0), (45.0, -85.0), and (65.0, -105.0).

### General Placement Errors
- Always check the environment and ensure that the intended placement area is clear and suitable for the entity being placed. This will help avoid placement failures and improve efficiency in building structures.
